data.strFullDescription: [p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3782070/extras/2dfa74ceeeb5ab9fb62f35ed44a673c7.poster.avif?t=1753883710" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3782070/extras/2dfa74ceeeb5ab9fb62f35ed44a673c7.webm?t=1753883710"][/imgvid][/p][p][/p][p]You are the king of the neighborhood, but one day you come home and catch your wife cheating with Dennis - the local thug. You want to do something about it but he is too strong and knocks you out. You wake up in the hospital with divorce papers, and after 6 months spent on the street, you are addicted to alcohol and drugs, left with nothing.[/p][p]Get into the gloomy and neglected atmosphere of an urban backyard.[/p][h2]Multiplayer[/h2][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3782070/extras/b491e0734fa2f17bd92dddf3e29885c7.poster.avif?t=1753883710" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3782070/extras/b491e0734fa2f17bd92dddf3e29885c7.webm?t=1753883710"][/imgvid][/p][p]Jump in with your crew into a world of total mayhem, where rules are just suggestions! Crazy actions, wild missions, and absurdity at every turn. Perfect for nights meant to get out of control.[/p][h2]Drink and Get High[/h2][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3782070/extras/b3ad11e5b12e53b7bf437f9768af3d4a.poster.avif?t=1753883710" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3782070/extras/b3ad11e5b12e53b7bf437f9768af3d4a.webm?t=1753883710"][/imgvid][/p][p]To be able to function, you must maintain the right level of satisfaction of your addiction cravings. Apart from special sensations, intoxicants will help you maintain control over your character, otherwise, you will experience withdrawal symptoms...[/p][h2]Earn money[/h2][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3782070/extras/e0a287b43f0cd7ed291759dc926beef1.poster.avif?t=1753883710" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3782070/extras/e0a287b43f0cd7ed291759dc926beef1.webm?t=1753883710"][/imgvid][/p][p]In order to buy drugs and alcohol, you will have to collect bottles, beg, steal, cheat, and look for other ways to earn money.[/p][h2]Factions[/h2][p][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3782070/extras/82832ede17a4b172e1fca9bfff445dc5.poster.avif?t=1753883710" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3782070/extras/82832ede17a4b172e1fca9bfff445dc5.webm?t=1753883710"][/imgvid][/p][p]The map is divided into special factions, each with different crews. You must defeat their boss to gain respect and take over their people.[/p][p][/p][list][*][p]First-person homeless crime sandbox[/p][/*][*][p]4-player online co-op - invite friends anytime[/p][/*][*][p]Dynamic drug hallucinations twist reality[/p][/*][*][p]Territory wars, rival bosses & dirty weapons[/p][/*][*][p]Steal, craft and survive the streets[/p][/*][/list][p][/p][p][b]Life is short â€“ get high, drink, have fun![/b][/p]
data.strSnippet: First-person homeless crime sandbox. Steal, drink, hallucinate and crush rival bums in chaotic online co-op.
